text: A student shall be able to search study rooms with available seats by campus, date, and time range.

clauses.text: A student shall be able to search study rooms with available seats by campus, date, and time range.

spans.text: by campus, date, and time range

text: When the student is authenticated, the system shall allow reserving one or more seats in a study room for a chosen time slot.

clauses.text: When the student is authenticated
the system shall allow reserving one or more seats in a study room for a chosen time slot.

spans.text: shall allow reserving one or more seats

text: If the selected study room has insufficient available seats for the requested time slot, the system shall reject the reservation and suggest the nearest available slots.

the system shall reject the reservation and suggest the nearest available slots.

text: A reservation shall include the room identifier, date, start time, end time, and the number of seats requested.

clauses.text: A reservation shall include the room identifier, date, start time, end time, and the number of seats requested.

spans.text: the room identifier, date, start time, end time, and the number of seats requested

text: The system shall prevent a student from booking more than 2 active reservations per day and more than 6 per week.

more than 2 active reservations per day

text: If the student already has an active booking for the same time range, the system shall block creating another booking for that time range.

the system shall block creating another booking for that time range.

spans.text: If the student already has an active booking for the same time range,

text: A student shall be able to cancel a booking up to 30 minutes before the start time; otherwise, the system shall mark it as late-cancel.

text: If a reservation is canceled, the system shall immediately release the reserved seats and notify students on the waitlist, if any.

clauses.text: If a reservation is canceled
the system shall immediately release the reserved seats and notify students on the waitlist, if any.

text: A student shall be able to join a waitlist for a fully booked room on a specific date.

clauses.text: A student shall be able to join a waitlist for a fully booked room on a specific date.

text: When a room becomes available, the system shall offer the slot to the first student on the waitlist and give 10 minutes to confirm.

text: If the student does not confirm within 10 minutes, the system shall offer the slot to the next student on the waitlist.

the system shall offer the slot to the next student on the waitlist.

spans.text: If the student does not confirm within 10 minutes,
the system shall offer the slot to the next student on the waitlist.

text: The system shall send a booking confirmation via email and in-app notification within 1 minute after a successful reservation.

by 15 minutes after the start time
the system shall automatically cancel the booking and record a no-show

clauses.text: If a no-show is recorded
three times within 30 days

text: The system shall display room capacity, equipment (e.g., whiteboard, projector), and accessibility features before booking.

clauses.text: The system shall display room capacity, equipment (e.g., whiteboard, projector), and accessibility features before booking.

text: A student shall be able to filter rooms by minimum capacity and required equipment.

clauses.text: A student shall be able to filter rooms by minimum capacity and required equipment.

text: If the number of seats requested exceeds the remaining available seats, the system shall prevent the reservation and explain the capacity constraint.

the system shall prevent the reservation and explain the capacity constraint

the system shall automatically block the room until the issue is resolved.
